name: Salted Cashew Sweet Potato Fudge
author: Bruce's Yams
summary: A unique twist on a classic white chocolate fudge recipe! While quick and easy to prepare, Bruce's® Yams Salted Cashew Sweet Potato Fudge is a nutty, sweet treat that no one will expect but will instantly love.
ingredients: ½ cup Bruce's® Yams Cut Sweet Potatoes in Syrup, drained and mashed
directions: Spray a 4 x 5-inch glass dish with non-stick baking spray; set aside
Warm a glass bowl and add white chocolate chips
Heat in microwave, stopping every 20 seconds to stir
When melted, stir in mashed Bruce's® Yams Cut Sweet Potatoes, cream, vanilla, salt and nutmeg
Mix quickly, then add cashew butter and continue to mix until very smooth
Sprinkle with chopped cashews (patting them gently into fudge)
Refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours
